title: Text2midi-InferAlign: Improving Symbolic Music Generation with Inference-Time Alignment
author: Abhinaba Roy (Singapore University of Technology and Design), Geeta Puri (Singapore University of Technology and Design), Dorien Herremans (Singapore University of Technology and Design), ...
relevance_why: The paper introduces a method that enhances text-to-music generation, which could directly inform Haohe Liu's work in generative AI for music, enabling better alignment between textual descriptions and generated musical compositions.
background: Symbolic music generation from text descriptions is challenging due to the need for alignment between language and musical elements.
contribution: Text2midi-InferAlign introduces inference-time alignment techniques to improve the quality of generated symbolic music, achieving better coherence with text captions and adherence to musical structures.

technical_comparison.prior_work: Previous methods, while effective at generating midi from text, often lack mechanisms to ensure that generated music maintains structural integrity and aligns closely with the input text.
technical_comparison.novelty: This work improves by incorporating reward-guided exploration and exploitation phases in a tree search approach to refine music generation based on alignment with specific objectives.

key_innovation: The method combines caption mutation and dual reward scores for text-audio consistency and harmonic consistency to enhance symbolic music generation.
real_world_impact: This approach could lead to advancements in music composition tools, enabling users to create compositions that more accurately reflect their descriptions or emotions, thus enhancing creative expression.

new_terms.text-audio consistency score: **Text-audio consistency score** measures how well the generated music corresponds to the rhythmic and semantic qualities of the input text.
new_terms.harmonic-consistency score: **Harmonic-consistency score** penalizes music notes that do not conform to the expected musical key.
